content: We are seeing very positive I would say, merger into the US -- emerging its products into the US market, we're seeing advantages and added value that is coming with the products that Dangot brought, and we're seeing good demand and how it completes better our solution in the different segments and markets we operate in, which brings again, it all turns to better and stronger backlog, and it comes a lot as well by selling -- cross-selling Dangot's equipment into our existing customer base and also new customers by expanding our services to our existing customers.
